workflow.meta: 其他管理审批流程(不需质控审批)

function.name: lb.WfFormUpdate
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s1=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT YG FROM ECIF.TIB_GDSYZBRYJG WHERE TYPE = 4 START WITH YG = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR FID = ID",[$Login.User])
var s2=O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.TDFZR;
var s3=ABS_NULLSUB(O_WORKFLOW.XMMC,0);
ABS_IF(s3>0,s2,s1)

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var key;
key=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 10016",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
key==0

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s1=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT YG FROM ECIF.TIB_GDSYZBRYJG WHERE TYPE = 4 START WITH YG = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR FID = ID",[$Login.User])
var s2=O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.TDFZR;
var s3=ABS_NULLSUB(O_WORKFLOW.XMMC,0);
ABS_IF(s3>0,s2,s1)==$Login.User

result.display-name: 并购融资部及其下属团队

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 and id = 13929 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 1

result.display-name: 投资银行总部及其下属团队

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 and id = 10015 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 1

step.name: 投资银行总部总经理审批
并购融资部总经理审批

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 17 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_GS_FXQGLSP",O_WORKFLOW.ID,18,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 19 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_GS_FXQGLSP",O_WORKFLOW.ID,20,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_GS_FXQGLSP",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'120000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_GS_FXQGLSP",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
	true;
}else{
	false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select status from ECIF.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_GS_FXQGLSP') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1
